name: The Last Viking In The Dungeon Of Doom FREE
name_original: The Last Viking In The Dungeon Of Doom FREE
description:
The Last Viking is an unique epic adventure through 100 levels full of traps, monsters, bats and ghosts. You have to avoid all the hazards like guillotines, poison gas, spikes, spiders and a lot more.

Touch the controls to twist and turn through the level. There are 10 dungeons with 10 rooms each. Collect all the stars in every room.

Can you master all 100 levels to help the Last Viking to find out of the dungeon?

Features:
-100 hard to master levels
-Very addictive gameplay
-Suitable for all ages
-Easy to learn but very hard to master
-Fun sounds and music

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
